grid.interfaces.DAO

Interface GridElementDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GridElementDAOImpl

    public interface GridElementDao
    DAO for an element of the grid, this class has been build after a consolidation of all DAOs developed for each entity, all these DAOs were sharing most of their code, this fact implies a problem for code maintenance so all these classes have been unified in this one
    Author:
    Paride Casulli, Lorenzo La Banca
